name: Guayota
description:
Guayota began as a Final Project Master's Degree at the Complutense University of Madrid throughout 2019. With this game, we have received three awards the last year:

  • Most Innovative Game, at Playstation Talents 2019 Contest
  • Best Gameplay, at FIMP 2019 by AEVI (the Spanish Video Game National Association)
  • Best Game Audience Award at DevTalks 2019 by the European University of Madrid

We plan to finish the game this year, aiming for a launch in early 2021 in PC platforms (TBD).
